```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.aws.polly.PollyFunctions;
import com.pulumi.aws.polly.inputs.GetVoicesArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        final var example = PollyFunctions.getVoices(GetVoicesArgs.builder()
            .languageCode("en-GB")
            .build());

    }
}
```

<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="engine_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#engine_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Engine</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Engine used by Amazon Polly when processing input text for speech synthesis. Valid values are <code>standard</code>, <code>neural</code>, and <code>long-form</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="includeadditionallanguagecodes_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#includeadditionallanguagecodes_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Include<wbr>Additional<wbr>Language<wbr>Codes</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to return any bilingual voices that use the specified language as an additional language.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="languagecode_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#languagecode_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Language<wbr>Code</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Language identification tag for filtering the list of voices returned. If not specified, all available voices are returned.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="voices_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#voices_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Voices</a>

    <dd>List of voices with their properties. See <code>voices</code> Attribute Reference below.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="engine_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#engine_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">engine</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Engine used by Amazon Polly when processing input text for speech synthesis. Valid values are <code>standard</code>, <code>neural</code>, and <code>long-form</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="includeadditionallanguagecodes_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#includeadditionallanguagecodes_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">include<wbr>Additional<wbr>Language<wbr>Codes</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to return any bilingual voices that use the specified language as an additional language.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="languagecode_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#languagecode_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">language<wbr>Code</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Language identification tag for filtering the list of voices returned. If not specified, all available voices are returned.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="voices_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#voices_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">voices</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#getvoicesvoice">List&lt;Property Map&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>List of voices with their properties. See <code>voices</code> Attribute Reference below.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>

## Supporting Types


<h4 id="getvoicesvoice">Get<wbr>Voices<wbr>Voice</h4>



<div>

            title="Required">
